allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Complete Phase 3: Structure Domain

Add comprehensive structural engineering elements:

Beams \(beams.ts\):
- Steel beams with W-shapes, HSS, channels
- Wood beams with dimensional lumber, glulam, LVL
- Span calculations, deflection checks, moment/shear capacity
- Support for simple, fixed, cantilever, and continuous spans

Columns \(columns.ts\):
- Steel columns with buckling analysis per AISC 360
- Wood columns with stability factor per NDS
- K-factor lookup for various end conditions
- Slenderness checks and capacity calculations

Base Plates \(base-plates.ts\):
- Steel base plate design per AISC Design Guide 1
- Anchor bolt calculations per ACI 318
- Bearing pressure, plate bending, anchor tension/shear
- Concrete breakout capacity checks

Bracing \(bracing.ts\):
- Diagonal bracing \(X-brace, chevron, single diagonal\)
- Horizontal bracing for diaphragms
- Slenderness limits for tension/compression
- SCBF seismic provisions support

Connections \(connections.ts\):
- Bolted connections \(shear tab, double angle, end plate\)
- Welded connections \(fillet, CJP, PJP\)
- Bolt shear, bearing, and block shear checks
- Weld strength calculations per AWS D1.1

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
